data.message:
Hello friends, 
I am in a process of working over my dissertation about Marketing strategies of Coca - Cola. I need to include survey as part of my project so I ask you to help me by taking part in it. There are ten very light questions and it wont take more than five minutes of your time. Thank you very much in advance!
Here is the link: https://www.questionpro.com/a/TakeSurvey?id=5797526

replies.message: Hi Vili, unfortunately, we would not be able to complete any surveys of this nature as they usually seek proprietary information and providing such information is against company policy. You can download general information from the following websites at http://spr.ly/618480j24, www.cokecce.co.uk, www.coca-cola.co.uk and also our global website at http://spr.ly/618580j2f, which we hope will be helpful for your research. Thanks!
